sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Navbar from './components/Navbar'; import ScrollToTop from './components/ScrollToTop'; import './students.css'; const Students = () => { const [isTopBarVisible, setIsTopBarVisible] = useState(true); const [lastScrollY, setLastScrollY] = useState(0); // Scroll-based navbar visibility useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const currentScrollY = window.scrollY; if (currentScrollY > lastScrollY && currentScrollY > 100) { // Scrolling down and past initial 100px setIsTopBarVisible(false); } else if (currentScrollY < lastScrollY && currentScrollY < 50) { // Scrolling up and almost at the top (within 50px) setIsTopBarVisible(true); } setLastScrollY(currentScrollY); }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll, { passive: true }); return () => { window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }; }, [lastScrollY]); return (
{/* Students Page Header */}

Student Portal

Access essential resources and information for your academic journey

{/* Student Handbook Section */}

Student Handbook

Your comprehensive guide to academic policies, procedures, and campus life

Student Handbook 2025-2026

Complete guide containing all policies, procedures, and guidelines for students.

Code of Conduct

Standards of behavior and ethical guidelines for all students.

Academic Policies

Academic integrity, grading system, and academic requirements.

{/* Academic Calendar Section */}

Academic Calendar

Important dates and schedules for the academic year

Academic Calendar 2025-2026

Complete academic year schedule including holidays, exams, and important dates.

Class Schedule

Current semester class schedules and room assignments.

Exam Schedule

Midterm and final examination schedules for all programs.

{/* Student Services Section */}

Student Services

Comprehensive support services to enhance your academic experience

Guidance & Counseling

Professional counseling services for academic, personal, and career development.

  • Academic Advising
  • Career Counseling
  • Personal Development
  • Mental Health Support

Library Services

Access to extensive collections of books, journals, and digital resources.

  • Book Collections
  • Online Databases
  • Study Spaces
  • Research Support

Registrar's Office

Academic records, enrollment services, and official documentation.

  • Enrollment Services
  • Transcript Requests
  • Academic Records
  • Graduation Requirements

Health Services

Medical care, health education, and wellness programs for students.

  • Medical Check-ups
  • Health Education
  • Emergency Care
